casebody.data:
No. 10-5351. William Larry Weaver, Petitioner v. Steve Bullock, Attorney General of Montana, et al. 562 U.S. 916, 131 S. Ct. 282, 2010 U.S. LEXIS 6944.

178 L. Ed. 2d 185,

October 4, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 370 Fed. Appx. 869.
